amendment.description: To provide a multiagency effort to slow the spread of Asian carp in the Upper Mississippi and Ohio River basins and tributaries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 813 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 117.

action.text: Amendment SA 813 proposed by Senator Brown.
